about.title: About me
about.desc: I am a Computer Engineer graduated from the Polytechnic University of Valencia in Spain, with more than 3 years of experience in the field. I love learning new things and acquiring new skills every day. In my free time, I enjoy reading, going to the gym, and trail running.
about.bookDesc: The Truth About the Harry Quebert Affair

learning.title: Now Learning...
learning.desc: Currently I am focused on the following subjects:

item1.desc: Fullstack developer using PHP for backend MySQL database and React and jQuery for the frontend.

item2.desc: Software developer, I used C++ and Python for programming scanners that detects fruit and vegetables defects.

item3.desc:
Working for different projects on the front-end.
  • - Development in Angular and React.
  • - Databases management.
  • - Unit and functional tests.
  • - Agile methodology.

item4.desc:
Development of a NFT Marketplace for DC COMICS on the Palm blockchain.
  • - Implementing different functionalities with Reactand TypeScript.
  • - Making deployments to the different environments.
  • - Unit tests for each component of the application.
  • - SCRUM planning using Jira.

item5.desc:
Development of a web platform for SIA.
  • - Creating components in React.
  • - Develop backend platform with the CMS Drupal (Headless) with PHP.
  • - Connect frontend and backend.
  • - Managing databases.
  • - Managing containers with Docker.

item2.title: TFG
item2.desc: Final project for the Computer Science Degree. This web allow you to order food from a restaurant.

item4.title: Web Miguel Pinto
item4.desc: Web for the painter Miguel Pinto. Using NextJS and deployed in Vercel.

item6.title: Photo searcher
item6.desc: Web that allow you to search photos using the Unplash API, React and Redux.
